node.title: CST_Storage_24
node.doctext:
This is a storage node for CST reviews. Reviews are moved here from our working area in [CST_Chat].

This archive begins on 01/08/2007, When it's full we'll move to [CST_Storage_25].

See also CST Storage collabs [CST_Storage_1|1] - [CST_Storage_23|23].

Batch Processed on: 8 January 2007 part 2

Writeup Title:[Allentown]
Author:[Uberfetus]
Reviewer: [Lometa]
Public domain?: No.
Original Author's Permission received?: (Y/N/NA)
Quoted content less than 33%: 52%
Compliance Assessment:No.
Review Request (w/timestamp) & Notes:2006-12-20@17:25 [borgo] says - hi sweetie - do you or oneof your CST folks wanna take a look at [Allentown] and see if it's compliant....
Hello Uberfetus, Unfortunately E2 can no longer keep copyrighted works in its database because of the [E2 copyright changes]. If you would like to update and resubmit this write up you may want to read through the [E2 FAQ: Copyrighted Material] for suggestions and ideas.

Hello Mr. Hotel, This write up was submitted to [Content _Salvage] for copyright evaluation and passes with flying colors. If you would like to you may add the [CST approved] tag.

Hi there, Bad news I'm afraid. This writeup doesn't appear to be compliant with the [E2 FAQ: Copyrighted Material|E2 Copyright Policy]. If you'd like to update it for compliance and repost, I'd be glad to assist.
Tc = 433, Tq = 329, %q= 78%
The poem is from the volume titled A Tear and a Smile pub 1950

Author:[novasoy]
Reviewer: [Lometa]
Public domain?: No.
Original Author's Permission received?: No.
Quoted content less than 33%: 63%
Compliance Assessment: No.
Review Request (w/timestamp) & Notes:2006-12-08@21:12 ([CST_Group]) [wertperch] says Would one of you please check out [Doc Martens], novasoy's w-u? I did ask whether there were copyright issues, and I had no response. I'd assume there are, either through Alexei Sayle or the BBC.
Hello novosoy, This write up has been submitted to [Content_Salvage] for a copyright evaluation. Unfortunately because of the [E2 copyright changes], E2 can no longer keep copyrighted work in the database. If you would like to update and resubmit this you may want to read through the [E2 FAQ: Copyrighted Material] for suggestions and ideas. If you have any questions I will be happy to help. :)

Writeup Title:[Summer Movie]
Author:[Ereneta]
Reviewer: [Lometa]
Public domain?: No.
Original Author's Permission received?: No.
Quoted content less than 33%: 27%
Compliance Assessment: Yes.
Review Request (w/timestamp) & Notes: 2006-11-24@5:08 jessicapierce says [Summer Movie] -[ereneta]
Hello Ereneta, This write up has been submitted to [Content_Salvage] for copyright evaluation. Unfortunately there needs to be more content added to meet fair use. If you would like to flesh it out some more you may want to read through the [E2 FAQ: Copyrighted Material] for suggestions and ideas. If you have any questions please feel free to ask:) If I don’t hear from you by next [December 7,2006|Thursday] I’ll assume you don’t want to update it and it will be removed.
wow--thank you for doing such a fantastic job updating this write up! If you would like to you may append the [CST approved] tag. :)

Writeup Title:[Daemon Irrepit Callidus]
Author:[TrbleClef]
Reviewer: [Lometa]
Public domain?: No.
Original Author's Permission received?: No.
Quoted content less than 33%: 58% English and 56% Latin
Compliance Assessment: No.
Review Request (w/timestamp) & Notes: 2006-11-14@18:36 jessicapierce says Daemon Irrepit Callidus (the translation, specifically)?
Hello TrbleClef, This write up was submitted to [Content_Salvage] for copyright evaluation. György Orbán was born in 1947 and Dr. Rodney Wynkoop is currently a professional conductor that performs at a number of colleges and universities. Unfortunately both versions of this piece are under copyright and the write up has to be removed. If you would like to update and resubmit it you may want to read through the [E2 FAQ: Copyrighted Material] for suggestions and ideas. If you have any questions please feel free to ask:)
